notes_text: In 2016 a constitutional commission rejected proposals to legalize medicinal or recreational use of cannabis.
notes: In 2016 a constitutional commission rejected proposals to legalize medicinal or recreational use of cannabis.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Guatemala}} In 2016 a constitutional commission rejected proposals to legalize medicinal or recreational use of cannabis.<ref>{{cite web |author=Milena Lopez |url=http://www.tn8.tv/cronica-tn8/373406-comision-rechaza-uso-medicinal-marihuana-guatemala/ |title=Comisi√≥n Rechaza Uso Medicinal De La Marihuana En Guatemala |date=2 November 2016 |publisher=Tn8.tv |access-date=30 November 2016 |archive-date=5 September 2017 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170905095333/http://www.tn8.tv/cronica-tn8/373406-comision-rechaza-uso-medicinal-marihuana-guatemala/ |url-status=live }}</ref><ref>{{cite web |author=Juan Toro |url=http://clustersalud.americaeconomia.com/guatemala-rechazan-uso-marihuana-medicinal/ |title=Guatemala: Rechazan uso de marihuana medicinal |website=Cluster Salud |access-date=30 November 2016 |archive-date=3 October 2018 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181003102740/https://clustersalud.americaeconomia.com/guatemala-rechazan-uso-marihuana-medicinal/ |url-status=dead }}</ref>
